page.title: 09EDUCATION
page.content: { STURMINSTER NEWTON HIGH SCHOOL}caters for children from 11_16.At 16 they take their "o" levels then leave school.They can then go to college, jobs or YTS.Mr. Russel the headmaster has been here for many years. {ADULT TRAINING CENTRE}caters for people over 16 years.They are helped with problems both emotional and physical.They come from a radius of 20 miles.The trainees enjoy mixing with others with the same disabilities and being treated as equals. {YEWSTOCK}caters for people with special educational needs.They age from 2_17/18.After leaving they can go to college, jobs, YTS or the Adult Training Centre.The aims of this school are to let the pupils lead an independent life. {PLAYSCHOOL}the children learn to share & have a good basis for education.
